thread.section_title: Mavis Discount Tire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mavis Discount Tire | mavistire.com
thread.title: JW
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by JW

author: JW
title: JW
text:
I moved to Mt. Pocono back in 2012 and been going to STS for my automotive needs. Then STS became Mavis and I was skeptical with the new managers and some new faces the mechanics.
Every time I would bring my car for service Cody the manager always would be there and he explains what service is needed and the Quote: is close and if its more he would explain why.
I usually wait for my car and sometimes it done in what I consider appropriate time or sometimes longer. Of course they do not carry all the parts so they rely from local auto stores or even out of town. So once the part is delivered (depending on the job) they get you out in a reasonable amount of time.
